Lovi: I am Seel Son of King Carpin.
Lovi2: Erghh.. fine, hey wait a second..
I mean you seem kind of strong..
LoviSure!: You need to retrive 3 Jellyfish for me, they should be here somewhere.
LoviHell no you mean... fish!: That's the best insult you got?
Okay, so like I was supposed to be babysitting these Jellyfish..
And umm long story short I lost like 3 of them.
And I swear the mother is so creepy, like if I don't give her her children back she's gonna like eat me or something
Please retrive them, they must be here somewhere.
LoviDone: Here take this weird shield or something i don't really know what to do with it.
And you little jellyfish rascals are going to your jellyfish rooms. No exceptions
LoviWaiting: Have you found them yet? The Jellyfish should be here somewhere.
Ah, okay why did you talk to me then?!
Intro: I'll learn  the song of the waves.
Herera: Hahaha, the old Carpin having a son.. I feel pity for you, honestly.
He's a horrible person, but you wouldn't know.. who would tell their child how horrible they are?
The song of the waves, that's what your searching? To break the seal?
Well luckily I am guarding it.
Fight me child if you so wish to free your father...
Nah, not right now I got better things to do.
HereraEnd: Go on, take that song.. taking some music lessons would be a good idea by the way.. free your father..
But just so you know you are doing a bad thing here.
HereraGoodEnd: You see this place, it is beautiful, isn't it?
But this place isn't everything, it is just [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]his[/wave] garden.
When I was young... the place I came from was just as beautiful.
But years passed and the place lost it's beauty, as he only started caring about his garden, himself and... [wave amp=50.0 freq=5.0 connected=1]you[/wave].
People started rioting.. and your mother.. not knowing what to do tried to fight against them...
Your father wouldn't budge.. it seemed as if he didn't really care about her..
My mother and your mother were friends..
Please.. Seel.. don't free your father...
Do it for your kingdom.. do it for.. her.
